publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4513 Marilyn Livingstone: Launch of Co-operative Education Trust Scotland—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of CETS (Co-operative Education Trust Scotland); notes that its purpose is to promote knowledge of the co-operative and mutual sector in schools; believes that too little is currently known about the potential of the co-operative sector as a business model; recognises that co-operative and mutual businesses produce 5.6% of Scottish GDP and employ up to 27,000 people, and believes that CETS will encourage all involved in education in Scotland to learn more about the potential of the co-operative and mutual sector. Supported by: Christine May*
S2M-4513 Launch of Co-operative Education Trust Scotland (lodged on 7 June 2006) Alex Neil*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-4513 Marilyn Livingstone: Launch of Co-operative Education Trust Scotland—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of CETS (Co-operative Education Trust Scotland); notes that its purpose is to promote knowledge of the co-operative and mutual sector in schools; believes that too little is currently known about the potential of the co-operative sector as a business model; recognises that co-operative and mutual businesses produce 5.6% of Scottish GDP and employ up to 27,000 people, and believes that CETS will encourage all involved in education in Scotland to learn more about the potential of the co-operative and mutual sector. Supported by: Christine May, Alex Neil, Chris Ballance, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-4513 Launch of Co-operative Education Trust Scotland (lodged on 7 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4513 Launch of Co-operative Education Trust Scotland (lodged on 7 June 2006) Trish Godman*
